text: Charles Angelo Savarin (born 1943) is a Dominican politician. He became the eighth President of Dominica in October 2013.http://www.un.org/webcast/ga/61/pdfs/dominica-e.pdf He served as President until October 2023. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Dominica Category:Current national leaders
title: Charles Savarin
